name: liver hemangioma
description: Benign growth of blood vessels in the liver, often discovered accidentally during abdominal imaging scans. It appears as a distinct bright spot on ultrasound and CT scans, and as a bright area on MRI

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: cannot determine whether liver hemangioma is present

values.name: unknown
values.description: uncertainty regarding the presence of liver hemangioma

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The anatomical region of the liver hemangioma
